alert.note: Alert for Lincoln; Oklahoma; Pottawatomie (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 09 at 2:18AM CDT until July 09 at 2:45AM CDT by NWS Norman-Oklahoma City
info.description: The National Weather Service in Norman has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... East central Oklahoma County in central Oklahoma... Southern Lincoln County in central Oklahoma... Northwestern Pottawatomie County in central Oklahoma... * Until 245 AM CDT. * At 218 AM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near McLoud, moving northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and half dollar size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Shawnee, Chandler, Harrah, McLoud, Meeker, Sparks, Dale, and Aydelotte. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.25 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
